snippet: Mayor Dawn Zimmer said that she met with federal investigators who are looking into her allegation that Lt. Gov. Kim Guadagno threatened to withhold federal storm aid.
abstract: Hoboken, NJ, Mayor Dawn Zimmer meets with federal prosecutors who are investigating her allegation that New Jersey Lt Gov Kim Guadagno threatened to withhold federal storm aid to her city after Hurricane Sandy; claims Guadagno told her that she had to support real estate project in Hoboken that was important to Gov Chris Christie in order to receive federal aid controlled by the state.

byline.contributor: Annie Correal, Alan Feuer and William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mayor Dawn Zimmer said that she met with federal investigators who are looking into her allegation that Lt. Gov. Kim Guadagno threatened to withhold federal storm aid.

headline.main: U.S. Attorney Said to Meet With Hoboken Mayor
headline.print_headline: U.S. Attorney Said to Meet With Hoboken Mayor
